newsitem.title: USA: MDL Information sees lower Q2 shr.
newsitem.headline: MDL Information sees lower Q2 shr.

text.p: MDL Information Systems Inc said Thursday it expects earnings per share for its second quarter to be between $0.10 a share and $0.12 compared to $0.19 a share in the year-ago period.
The company also said it expects revenues for the quarter, ended September 30, to be in the range of $15 million to $16 million, an increase from $14 million in the year-ago period.
"Although the USA and Asia/Pacific met or exceeded their goals, Europe was below its revenue plan," said Steven Goldby, chairman and chief executive officer.
"Two substantial orders that were expected to close, did not, resulting in lower than expected revenues and earnings per share," he added.
MDL said its customers are the world's leading pharmaceutical and chemical companies, and the timing of large orders can impact quarterly results.
MDL is a provider of integrated scientific information management systems for pharmaceutical and related companies.
